meanings.definition: A type of pepper with a mild flavor.
meanings.sent1: I added cubanelles to the salad for a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for cubanelles, but I used bell peppers instead.
meanings.sent3: The cubanelles in the stir-fry were the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweetness of cubanelles on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cubanelles cooking filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: The grocery store had a sale on cubanelles, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent2: Cubanelles are a great addition to any pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: The cubanelles on the counter rolled around like marbles.
meanings.sent4: The cubanelles in the garden stood tall like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the cubanelles brightened up the kitchen.
